fields.name: Royal Blood (Passive):
fields.value:
During elections for a new King, votes for you count twice.
- Passive kept on class change.

fields.name: Political Pressure (Day, 2 Uses):
fields.value:
Force target player A to vote for target player B. Then, prevent target A from voting further voting for the day.
- Cannot force the King to vote, but can force votes against the King.

fields.name: Gossip (Night):
fields.value:
Receive the feedback (ability result message) of abilities used on target player tonight.
- Will not receive feedback for abilities that convert, attack, self target, or King abilities.
- Cannot target King.

fields.name: Court Spy (Night, 2 Uses):
fields.value: Summon shadows to report the contents of all whispers tomorrow.
